00035 #define HARDLINK_LIST_HASH(H)                                               \
00036   (crc32_update (crc32_update (crc32_buffer ((H)->name.str, (H)->name.len), \
00037                  &(H)->parent_dev, sizeof (uint32_t)),                      \
00038    &(H)->parent_ino, sizeof (uint32_t)))

00040 typedef struct hardlink_list_entry_def *hardlink_list_entry;
00041 
00043 struct hardlink_list_entry_def
00044 {
00046   hardlink_list_entry next;
00047   hardlink_list_entry prev;
00048 
00050   uint32_t parent_dev;
00051 
00053   uint32_t parent_ino;
00054 
00056   string name;
00057 };
00058 
00060 typedef struct hardlink_list_def
00061 {
00063   htab_t htab;
00064 
00066   pthread_mutex_t *mutex;
00067 
00069   hardlink_list_entry first;
00070   hardlink_list_entry last;
00071 } *hardlink_list;
